{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10138v1", "title": "$k$-Fibonacci numbers that are palindromic concatenations of two
  distinct Repdigits", "summary": "Let $k\ge 2$ and $\{F_n^{(k)}\}_{n\geq 2-k}$ be the sequence of
$k$--generalized Fibonacci numbers whose first $k$ terms are $0,\ldots,0,0,1$
and each term afterwards is the sum of the preceding $k$ terms. In this paper,
we determine all $k$-Fibonacci numbers that are palindromic concatenations of
two distinct repdigits.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-14T11:52:33Z"}
